DOC.brief_summary: To determine best dose investigational agent AG-013736 combination various standard care treatment advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Investigational Agent AG-013736 In Combinations With Standard Of Care Treatments For Patient 's With Advanced Solid Tumor
DOC.criteria: Advanced solid tumor suitable treatment Taxanes , without carboplatin , treatment Capecitabine , Gemcitabine/Cisplatin . Pemetrexed/Cisplatin Tumors abut provide support blood vessel Any significant gastrointestinal abnormality active bleeding .
